title: AnytimeCapital
author: AnytimeCapital
content: Last night wire transfers on Binance.US were announced to stop. Post your top platform that works in USA to buy/sell Bitcoin with wire transferI'll go first Â Anytime Capital (www.anytime-capital.com) still offers instant wire transfer for deposit and withdrawal, it's been great.Anytime Capital is a US licensed financial institution that specializes in cryptocurrency trading. We are particularly good for large wire transfer purchases, and our customer service is top-notch (you can actually talk to a real person!). What I appreciate most is how we handle wire transfers swiftly and securely.BENEFITS OF ANYTIME CAPITAL- Quick and easy Bitcoin purchases with wire transfers- Physical branch in Atlanta offering secure in-person transactions- Nationwide online services with live chat, website, and phone support- Fast KYC process, have Bitcoin in your wallet in less than an hour- Licensed and regulated financial institution- Extensive security measures to ensure the safety of your transactions- Competitive, low fees on all transactions- Offering a range of cryptocurrencies including Bitcoin, Ethereum, USDT, Dogecoin and more- Real, live customer service offering personalized support- User-friendly interface and processes, perfect for both experienced traders and beginners.[/list]Disclaimer: Always DYOR before making any financial decisions.
